title: Nations Trust Bank American Express‘Pump Fuel and Win’ Campaign rewards cardmembers
body_lines: Colombo, March 11, 2022 – Nations Trust Bank American Express announced the winners of the ‘Pump Fuel and Win’ campaign held in partnership with Samsung. Lucky Cardmembers Kalinga Pradeep Wijesinghe and Rajapaksha Manjula walked away with the latest Samsung Galaxy Z Fold3 5G and Samsung Galaxy Z Flip3 5G smartphones respectively.

Present at the handing over of the rewards (pictured from left to right) was Priyantha Jayasinghe, Deputy General Manager – Samsung, Kalinga Pradeep Wijesinghe- Winner of Samsung Galaxy Z Fold3 5G, Niluka Gunatilake – Senior Vice President – Cards & Consumer Assets of Nations Trust Bank and Sanjaya Senarath, Chief Marketing Officer of Nations Trust Bank.
